name: Hypothesis
text:
I imagine the body/
At Deathâ€™s mantle turns inward, breathes (heaves?)/
Switches the lights off once more. And right then,/
Right then, its cavern grows electric/
Fuzzed in that quick-dark glow.../
Eyelights vacate/
And the door shuts./
Let me fall with the felling of trees./
